CREATE TABLE application.log_story( id bigserial NOT NULL, story_id bigint NOT NULL, user_id bigint NOT NULL, story_action text NOT NULL, added date NOT NULL,
CONSTRAINT log_story_pk PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT ls_story_fk FOREIGN KEY (story_id) REFERENCES application.story (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT ls_user_fk FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES application.users (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )
